titleStmt.title: A second letter from the author of the discourse concerning extreme unction to the vindicator of the Bishop of Condom.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Clagett by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Imprimatur. Libellus cui titulus [A second letter from the author of the discourse concerning extreme unction, &c.] Decemb. 10, 1687. H. Maurice" .
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
